title: SONY Bravia W672G 108 cm (43 inch) Full HD LED Smart TV  (KLV-43W672G)

product_specification.In The Box: Warranty Card, AC Adapter, AC Power Cord, Remote Control, Table-Top Stand, User Manual - 1U each, Batteries - 2U
product_specification.Supported Video Formats: AVI, ASF, MP4, MKV, WebM, TS
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Warranty of the Product is Limited to Manufacturing Defects Only
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details:
Please note that any unauthorized handling or self-installation of the product will lead to return & product warranty being void
We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience.. The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost. The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features. The process generally covers: Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested. Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked. Demonstration of features and settings Quick run-through on how to operate the TV

product_description.FHD TV: Enjoy every visual clearly on this television’s 108 cm (43) FHD screen. Each visual will come alive on screen with good impact and less noise.
product_description.X-Reality PRO and HDR: Enjoy exceptional clarity on this television, thanks to the X-Reality PRO picture processing technology. This television’s High Dynamic Range (HDR) will enhance each frame on screen without losing on details.

review: Great picture quality and sound connectivity also good 1080 full HD, screen mirroring option is there and built in Wi-Fi Sony Bravia is wonderful TV is working perfectly , installation is done buy Sony technician it's free and Wall mount is also free,I am strongly recommended to buy everyone this TV, thanks to Flipkart.

Crystal clear picture quality and the colours feel so natural. This is what Sony TV's are meant for. Sound quality is absolutely perfect with noticable bass. Obviously you won't get that extreme bass. To enjoy quality picture via STB, a HD subscription is must.
A must buy affordable quality product.
This is a nice TV comes with trust of Sony. If anybody going for 32 inch smart TV then this is best one.
